data.title: Reshmi Ghosh
data.text:
Indian beauty queen and actress

Reshmi Ghosh is an Indian actress and beauty pageant titleholder.[1]

Early life

[edit]

Ghosh was born in 1978 and brought up in Kolkata. She attended school at Carmel Convent School (Class 10, 1995 batch). She graduated with a BA from Jogamaya Devi College in southern Kolkata in 2000. She has a younger sister.

Personal life

[edit]

Ghosh married to Siddharth Vasudev, her co-star from Shobha Somnath Ki on 1 February 2013 at Kolkata.[2][3] Ghosh and Vasudev played on-screen couple in Buddha.

Career

[edit]

Since being crowned Miss India Earth 2002,[4] Ghosh has appeared in several Bollywood films [5] as well as television serials [6] and advertisements. She did a Bollywood movie named "Tumse Milkar", based on a song from the film Pyar Jhukta Nahin, with Parvin Dabas.[7]
